U

ui - Variable in class hrps.HRPS
Main UI of the app.
UI - Class in hrps.boundary
This class is the main UI used for interacting with hotel managers through text command line.
UI() - Constructor for class hrps.boundary.UI
Dummy constructor.
updateAddress(Guest, String) - Method in class hrps.control.GuestController
Update a guest's address.
updateCheckInTime(Reservation, LocalDateTime) - Method in class hrps.control.ReservationController
Update desired check-in time of the specified pending/confirmed reservation if there are valid rooms for the new check-in time, might have to change room number of this reservation if current room does not satisfied new check-in time.
updateCheckOutTime(Reservation, LocalDateTime) - Method in class hrps.control.ReservationController
Update desired check-out time of the specified pending/confirmed reservation if there are valid rooms for the new check-out time, might have to change room number of this reservation if current room does not satisfied new check-out time.

Update a guest's contact information.

Update a guest's gender.
updateGuestDetailsUI(Guest) - Method in class hrps.boundary.GuestUI
Updates the guest details following inputs from the user.
updateGuestName(Guest, String) - Method in class hrps.control.GuestController
Update a guest's name.
updateId(Guest, ID) - Method in class hrps.control.GuestController

Display the UI for user to enter a item name to update its details, including name, description and price.
updateMenuItem(String, String, String, double) - Method in class hrps.control.MenuController
Update a menu item's information and update the database.
updateNationality(Guest, String) - Method in class hrps.control.GuestController
Update a guest's nationality.
updateNumberOfGuests(Reservation, int, int) - Method in class hrps.control.ReservationController

updateOrder() - Method in class hrps.control.OrderController
Update order's status and update the database.
updateReservation(Reservation, Reservation) - Method in class hrps.control.ReservationController
Replace a specified reservation with another reservation in the reservations' container and update the database.
updateReservationUI(Reservation) - Method in class hrps.boundary.ReservationUI
Display the UI for reading user's inputs on updating details of a reservation.
updateRoom(Room) - Method in class hrps.boundary.RoomUI
Display the UI to update the room details for the given room.
updateRoomByRoomNumber() - Method in class hrps.boundary.RoomUI
Find a room by room number.
updateRoomRate(Room, double) - Method in class hrps.control.RoomController
